function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Study of lifestyle changes before, during, and after COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Failure to understand and address lifestyle changes may lead to ineffective community planning","Mitigation":"Conduct in-depth research on lifestyle changes and consult with residents for insights","Technologies":"Data analytics, surveys, and community engagement platforms","People":"Community residents, urban planners","Owner":"Research team and urban planning authorities"},{"Description":"Introduction of non-contact interaction applications for urban community development","Impact":"Ineffective implementation may lead to lack of innovation and sustainability in urban communities","Mitigation":"Pilot testing of non-contact interaction applications, stakeholder feedback, and continuous improvement","Technologies":"Non-contact technologies, smart city solutions","People":"Urban planners, community residents","Owner":"Urban planning authorities and technology companies"}]}
